title: Pegasvs "El Final de la Noche" : Converse Make Noise
description:
As part of our Make Noise gig series in Barcelona, Spain, Pegasvs took to the stage of Discos Paradiso last month.

Track: Pegasvs: "El Final de la Noche". 

Shoes keep quiet. Sneakers make noise.

Stay tuned for more live tracks from Barcelona, coming soon to Converse YouTube.
